				Dear Dhuha

				 

				Thanks for the report but apparently these are the retail prices, we would require the cost price instead. Furthermore, we need the stock on hand in the store when the incident occurred.

				 

				Dear Rafat

				 

				We need a detailed report describing the incident with photos. If it’s related to the mall the insurance will request a responsibility letter addressed to the mall. Civil defense and municipality license as well the copy of Ejar contract.

				 

				Dear Firas

				 

				This is to inform you that we had a leakage at Chanel Kingdom which resulted a huge number of items, once we have the requirements ready please proceed with the claim.

etoilegroup.com <mailto:Fashiuddin.Jaffar@etoilegroup.com> >; Tarek Fakhereddin <Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com> >
				Subject: Emergency water leakage from IC

				 

				Dear Enova Team,

				 

				I hope this email finds you well.

				 

				I am writing to inform you about an urgent issue that requires immediate attention which was already discussed with Irfan ,There is a water leakage from the IC in our Boutique(Chanel Kingdom tower), and we need your expertise to address this problem as soon as possible.

				 

				The water leakage is causing significant damage to Goods(attached PIC for your reference ) . We need your technical expertise to identify the source of the leakage, repair the IC, and prevent any further damage.

				 

				Considering the urgency of the situation, I kindly request that you prioritize this task and allocate necessary resources to resolve the issue promptly. Time is of the essence, and we cannot afford any delays in addressing this emergency.

				 

				Please let me know when you are available and provide an estimated time for the resolution, also if there is any permit required .

				 

				 Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

				 

				Thank you for your immediate assistance.

				 

				Best regards,

				Assia Zad

				 

				Shop Manager, CHANEL Riyadh

				Al Nujaima Trading Co

				Tel :   +966 11 2112710

				Mobile :+966 595952399

				Fax :  +966 11 2112717

				Email : Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com <mailto:Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com>

etoilegroup.com <mailto:Fashiuddin.Jaffar@etoilegroup.com> >; Tarek Fakhereddin <Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com> >
				Subject: Emergency water leakage from IC

				 

				Dear Enova Team,

				 

				I hope this email finds you well.

				 

				I am writing to inform you about an urgent issue that requires immediate attention which was already discussed with Irfan ,There is a water leakage from the IC in our Boutique(Chanel Kingdom tower), and we need your expertise to address this problem as soon as possible.

				 

				The water leakage is causing significant damage to Goods(attached PIC for your reference ) . We need your technical expertise to identify the source of the leakage, repair the IC, and prevent any further damage.

				 

				Considering the urgency of the situation, I kindly request that you prioritize this task and allocate necessary resources to resolve the issue promptly. Time is of the essence, and we cannot afford any delays in addressing this emergency.

				 

				Please let me know when you are available and provide an estimated time for the resolution, also if there is any permit required .

				 

				 Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

				 

				Thank you for your immediate assistance.

				 

				Best regards,

				Assia Zad

				 

				Shop Manager, CHANEL Riyadh

				Al Nujaima Trading Co

				Tel :   +966 11 2112710

				Mobile :+966 595952399

				Fax :  +966 11 2112717

				Email : Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com <mailto:Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com> 

				Web : www.etoilegroup.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.etoilegroup.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C6212feebacbf487b4caa08dce39de7d1%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638635518097249507%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=VjVO3956%2B71unzxz%2FppymLK5RsQZsWBE49j9WShQOx4%3D&reserved=0>

etoilegroup.com <mailto:Fashiuddin.Jaffar@etoilegroup.com> >; Tarek Fakhereddin <Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com> >
				Subject: Emergency water leakage from IC

				 

				Dear Enova Team,

				 

				I hope this email finds you well.

				 

				I am writing to inform you about an urgent issue that requires immediate attention which was already discussed with Irfan ,There is a water leakage from the IC in our Boutique(Chanel Kingdom tower), and we need your expertise to address this problem as soon as possible.

				 

				The water leakage is causing significant damage to Goods(attached PIC for your reference ) . We need your technical expertise to identify the source of the leakage, repair the IC, and prevent any further damage.

				 

				Considering the urgency of the situation, I kindly request that you prioritize this task and allocate necessary resources to resolve the issue promptly. Time is of the essence, and we cannot afford any delays in addressing this emergency.

				 

				Please let me know when you are available and provide an estimated time for the resolution, also if there is any permit required .

				 

				 Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

				 

				Thank you for your immediate assistance.

				 

				Best regards,

				Assia Zad

				 

				Shop Manager, CHANEL Riyadh

				Al Nujaima Trading Co

				Tel :   +966 11 2112710

				Mobile :+966 595952399

				Fax :  +966 11 2112717

				Email : Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com <mailto:Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com>

				Dear Dhuha

				 

				Thanks for the report but apparently these are the retail prices, we would require the cost price instead. Furthermore, we need the stock on hand in the store when the incident occurred.

				 

				Dear Rafat

				 

				We need a detailed report describing the incident with photos. If it’s related to the mall the insurance will request a responsibility letter addressed to the mall. Civil defense and municipality license as well the copy of Ejar contract.

				 

				Dear Firas

				 

				This is to inform you that we had a leakage at Chanel Kingdom which resulted a huge number of items, once we have the requirements ready please proceed with the claim.

				 

				Regards

etoilegroup.com <mailto:Fashiuddin.Jaffar@etoilegroup.com> >; Tarek Fakhereddin <Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com> >
				Subject: Emergency water leakage from IC

				 

				Dear Enova Team,

				 

				I hope this email finds you well.

				 

				I am writing to inform you about an urgent issue that requires immediate attention which was already discussed with Irfan ,There is a water leakage from the IC in our Boutique(Chanel Kingdom tower), and we need your expertise to address this problem as soon as possible.

				 

				The water leakage is causing significant damage to Goods(attached PIC for your reference ) . We need your technical expertise to identify the source of the leakage, repair the IC, and prevent any further damage.

				 

				Considering the urgency of the situation, I kindly request that you prioritize this task and allocate necessary resources to resolve the issue promptly. Time is of the essence, and we cannot afford any delays in addressing this emergency.

				 

				Please let me know when you are available and provide an estimated time for the resolution, also if there is any permit required .

				 

				 Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

				 

				Thank you for your immediate assistance.

				 

				Best regards,

				Assia Zad

				 

				Shop Manager, CHANEL Riyadh

				Al Nujaima Trading Co

				Tel :   +966 11 2112710

				Mobile :+966 595952399

				Fax :  +966 11 2112717

				Email : Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com <mailto:Assia.zad@etoilegroup.com> 

				Web : www.etoilegroup.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.etoilegroup.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cb72128a9310747ce5ae208dce454bfd5%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638636300644056399%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=5jkNYIDMRMQthw%2B1krCwzseiL69hMR9Lid5ZxzzmZcA%3D&reserved=0>

	Dear Tarek, 

	 

	Pls print the attached FOA under your company letterhead , sign and stamp and return it back to us so we can proceed.

	 

	The settlement is agreed by the loss adjuster for the full claimed amount less 15% salvage and policy minimum deductible of SR20,000 for net amount of SR 257,819

	 

	Regards, 

	Firas 

	<ACCEPTANCE FORM-Chanel outlet..docx>

		The 15% considered on the low side according to the extent of damages and I am waiting for the claims manager to return from his leave to seek his exceptional approval.

		 

		I will keep you posted

		 

		Regards

		Firas

etoilegroup.com <mailto:Fashiuddin.Jaffar@etoilegroup.com> >; Tarek Fakhereddin <Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tarek.Fakhereddin@chalhoub.com> >
				Subject: Emergency water leakage from IC

				 

				Dear Enova Team,

				 

				I hope this email finds you well.

				 

				I am writing to inform you about an urgent issue that requires immediate attention which was already discussed with Irfan ,There is a water leakage from the IC in our Boutique(Chanel Kingdom tower), and we need your expertise to address this problem as soon as possible.

				 

				The water leakage is causing significant damage to Goods(attached PIC for your reference ) . We need your technical expertise to identify the source of the leakage, repair the IC, and prevent any further damage.

				 

				Considering the urgency of the situation, I kindly request that you prioritize this task and allocate necessary resources to resolve the issue promptly. Time is of the essence, and we cannot afford any delays in addressing this emergency.

				 

				Please let me know when you are available and provide an estimated time for the resolution, also if there is any permit required .

				 

				 Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

				 

				Thank you for your immediate assistance.

				 

				Best regards,

				Assia Zad

				 

				Shop Manager, CHANEL Riyadh

				Al Nujaima Trading Co
